CustomField.description: 'Importe total ofertado (sin IVA) Euros' ajustado seg√∫n el campo 'Diversification breakdown'. Se va a utilizar en los informes de Sofia
CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL( Bookings_breakdown__c, "No") || ISBLANK(TEXT( Bookings_breakdown__c)), NULL, IF( ISPICKVAL(Bookings_breakdown__c, "Up-selling"), Importe_total_sin_IVA__c * Up_selling__c, Importe_total_sin_IVA__c ) )
CustomField.label: Importe total ofertado (Breakdown ajust)
